## Project Structure

```
src/
├── core/           # Core modules

├── utils/          # Utility functions
└── index.js        # Entry point
```

## Coding Conventions

### Naming

- Files: `PascalCase.js` for classes, `camelCase.js` for utilities
- Classes: `PascalCase`
- Functions/Variables: `camelCase`
- Constants: `UPPER_SNAKE_CASE`
